question_text: Which of the following tradeoffs exist when comparing HDDs to SSDs in laptops? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: HDDs offer higher capacity at lower cost
SSDs provide faster data access speeds
HDDs consume less power than SSDs
SSDs are more resistant to physical shock
SSDs are noisier due to lack of spinning components
correct_answer: HDDs offer higher capacity at lower cost
SSDs provide faster data access speeds
SSDs are more resistant to physical shock
explanation: SSDs are faster and more durable, but HDDs offer cheaper high-capacity storage. SSDs are also quieter, not noisier.
